MfgProgramVariantFrcstFact.name: MfgProgramVariantFrcstFact
MfgProgramVariantFrcstFact.description: Represents information about the generated manufacturing program product variant forecast records.

AdjustedForecastedQuantity.description: The adjusted value of the forecasted quantity.

AdvAcctForecastSetUseId.description: The advanced account forecast set context associated with the manufacturing program variant forecast fact record.

ExternalReferenceNumber.description: The external identifier for the manufacturing program variant forecast fact record.

ForecastedQuantity.description: The forecasted quantity of the product variant that’s calculated by multiplying the forecasted quantity of the associated manufacturing program with the variant’s market share percentage.

ManufacturingProgramId.description: The manufacturing program associated with the manufacturing program product variant forecast fact record.

MarketSharePercent.description: The market share of the total number of variant product units in percent.

Name.description: The name of the manufacturing program variant forecast fact record.

PeriodId.description: The calendar period associated with the manufacturing program product variant forecast fact record.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the period for which the manufacturing program product variant forecast fact records are generated.

ProductId.description: The product variant associated with the manufacturing program product variant forecast fact record.

ProductionLocationId.description: The production location of the account.

ProductionModelId.description: The model associated with the manufacturing program variant forecast fact record.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the manufacturing program product variant forecast fact record.
